summary.span: 提供一个轻型控件，用于显示少量流内容。

span.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以包含在字符串其属性或流内容元素，如， ，和、 在其属性。A can contain a string in its property or flow content elements, such as , , and , in its property. 设计为轻量的并且特别适用于将集成到的流内容的小部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is designed to be lightweight, and is geared specifically at integrating small portions of flow content into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 最适合的单行显示，并提供良好的性能，显示最多几行内容。 is optimized for single-line display, and provides good performance for displaying up to a few lines of content. 没有为需要显示多个几行内容; 的方案进行优化对于此类方案中，结合适当查看控件是更好的选择比，在性能方面。 is not optimized for scenarios that need to display more than a few lines of content; for such scenarios, a coupled with an appropriate viewing control is a better choice than , in terms of performance. 后，是下一个最小权重控件用于显示流内容，只需提供极少的滚动内容区域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。After , is the next lightest-weight control for displaying flow content, and simply provides a scrolling content area with minimal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 是围绕流内容"页上的每一次的"查看模式进行了优化。 is optimized around "page-at-a-time" viewing mode for flow content. 最后，支持丰富的一组功能用于查看流内容，但是相应地更大权重。Finally, supports the richest set functionality for viewing flow content, but is correspondingly heavier-weight. 水平对齐文本内的，可使用属性。Horizontally aligning text within a is done with the property. 对齐页的布局中，可使用和属性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 元素。The following example shows how to use the element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimpleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblocksimplexaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： Textblock 和按钮](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "屏幕快照： Textblock 和按钮")![Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons") 下面的示例演示如何以显示如何实现类似结果以编程方式。The following example shows how to shows how to achieve similar results programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textblocksimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textblocksimple)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基线是假想的水平线与其对齐文本的行中的每个字符的基数。The baseline is the imaginary horizontal line with which the base of each character in a line of text is aligned. 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并`<`*对象* `="` *double*`".../>`，其中*对象*是一个对象中包含的元素 （通常流元素） 。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* `="`*double*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a . 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and .

summary.span: 获取或设置 的首选顶级字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: 一个 对象，指定首选字体系列，或者指定一个主要首选字体系列并附带一个或多个备用字体系列。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 默认字体是由 值确定的字体。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子元素上的设置重写此顶层的设置。Any settings on child elements override this top-level setting. 如果指定多个系列，第二个和后续的字体系列用作备用系列可以用于中的情况下，主字体系列不可用或不适用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性指定的首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用，以无提示方式回退到由确定的字体值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并`<`*对象* `="`*值*`".../>`，其中*对象*是对象元素（通常流元素） 中包含，和*值*XAML 值中所述是字符串格式值之一。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* `="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素，可以包含在支持一个类似非附加`FontFamily`属性，其中用于呈现。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the uses for rendering. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

[!code-xaml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#LineStackingStrategyExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/linestackingstrategyexample.xaml#linestackingstrategyexamplewholepage)] 下图显示上述代码的结果。The following illustration shows the result of the preceding code. ![屏幕快照： 比较 LineStackingStrategy 值](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "屏幕快照： 比较 LineStackingStrategy 值")![Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被描述为所有方向的一致性 (`Padding="10"`)，或如四个不同值表示保留，排名靠前的、 右键，并底部独立填充 (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`Padding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填充厚度超过相应内容区域的尺寸 （例如，左、 右边距宽度的总和超出内容区域宽度） 的填充厚度按比例缩小以不能大于相关内容区域的尺寸。If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding content area dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the content area width), the thickness of the padding is proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant content area dimension. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象是你可以将其添加到文本的视觉装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 文本修饰的四种类型： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建文本效果](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). 默认情况下，此属性设置为`null`，并且没有与之关联。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 在添加任何文本效果之前, 创建一个新并将其分配给此属性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute.
